```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

scorecard <- data.frame(scorecard)
ggplot(scorecard, aes(cost, debt)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

scorecard_num <- select(scorecard, is.numeric)

```
